mapper.insert: insert into `realauth` (realName, sex, bornDate, idNumber, address, state, image1, image2, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id) values (#{realName}, #{sex}, #{bornDate}, #{idNumber}, #{address}, #{state}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{remark}, #{auditTime}, #{applyTime}, #{auditor.id}, #{applier.id})
mapper.update: update `realauth` set realName = #{realName}, sex = #{sex}, bornDate = #{bornDate}, idNumber = #{idNumber}, address = #{address}, state = #{state}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, remark = #{remark}, auditTime = #{auditTime}, applyTime = #{applyTime}, auditor_id = #{auditor.id}, applier_id = #{applier.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select re.id, re.realName, re.sex, re.bornDate, re.idNumber, re.address, re.state, re.image1, re.image2, re.remark, re.auditTime, re.applyTime, au.id au_id,au.username au_username, ap.id ap_id,ap.username ap_username from `realauth` re join logininfo ap ON re.auditor_id = ap.id LEFT join logininfo au ON re.applier_id = ap.id where re.id = #{id}
